Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In today's news people are calling for a significant boost to JobSeeker welfare payments in next month's federal budget due to the current rate being too low to cover living costs. Meanwhile there is debate surrounding whether the Reserve Bank of New Zealand has already done too much or not enough to stabilize the economy amidst the pandemic. On a positive note a group of 11 stranded fishermen were rescued off Western Australia's coast after several days without food or water.
